name: Fractured Oscar Nominees 2006 Quiz | Fractured Celebrities | 15 Questions

questions.text: Fill up sea more rough men?
questions.explanation:
Philip Seymour Hoffman.

	Nominated for Best Actor in "Capote." He plays the title role.

Keira Knightley.

	Nominated for Best Actress in "Pride and Prejudice." She plays Jane Austen's most beloved heroine, Elizabeth Bennet.

Frances McDormand.

	Nominated for Best Supporting Actress in "North Country."

Steven Spielberg.

	Nominated for Achievement in Directing ("Munich").

Ang Lee.

	Nominated for Achievement in Directing ("Brokeback Mountain").

George Clooney.

	Dr. Ross of "ER" has come a long way. Nominated for Best Supporting Actor in "Syriana" AND Achievement in Directing ("Good Night and Good Luck") AND Best Original Screenplay (with Grant Heslov for "Good Night and Good Luck").

Paul Giamatti.

	Nominated for Best Supporting Actor in "Cinderella Man."

Matt Dillon.

	Nominated for Best Supporting Actor in "Crash." He plays a corrupt cop who redeems himself.

Judi Dench.

	Nominated for Best Actress in "Mrs. Henderson Presents."

Reese Witherspoon.

	Nominated for Best Actress in "Walk the Line." She plays June Carter Cash.

Joaquin Phoenix.

	Nominated for Best Actor in "Walk the Line." He plays Johnny Cash.

Rachel Weisz.

	Nominated for Best Supporting Actress in "The Constant Gardener."

Brokeback Mountain & Broke Back Mountain.

	Nominated for Best Picture. By Focus Features, the film depicts a love affair between two gay cowboys.

Jake Gyllenhaal.

	Nominated for Best Supporting Actor in "Brokeback Mountain." He plays a gay cowboy.

Felicity Huffman.

	Nominated for Best Actress in "Transamerica." She's a woman playing a man playing a woman.
